actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Pony Express National Historic Trail as a component of the National Trails System.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails Systems Act to designate the Pony Express National Historic Trail, extending from Saint Joseph, Missouri, through Kansas, Nebraska, Colorado, Wyoming, Utah, and Nevada to Sacramento, California, as a component of the National Trails System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Pony Express National Historic Trail as a component of the National Trails System.
